## clipboard.registry.register() function

Registers the given paster so that it cna be used for pasting.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function register<U extends ICopyData, T extends ICopyable<U>>(type: string, paster: IPaster<U, T>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | The type of the paster to register, e.g. 'block', 'comment', etc. |
|  paster | [IPaster](./blockly.ipaster.md)<!-- -->&lt;U, T&gt; | The paster to register. |

**Returns:**

void
